attributes.action: Bring back National Service, to any person between the ages of 16 - 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring back National Service, to any person between the ages of 16 - 18 who have not taken up further education at college (which one must be in the sciences or foreign languages or any other key subject) or have taken up a job in a trade.  So as to ensure all young adults are taking an active part in society and are developing necessary skills and being installed necessary discipline.

The national service must also be reduced in age to any child / young person leaving school early

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
